context/8: She followed me like a lamb.

response: If you're pig-headed enough to stay here and get yourself slaughtered,
context/0: Now git!
context/1: Put that down Ann, your father and I were friends.
context/4: I want you to get your things and get to the mission as fast as you can, you understand?
context/6: Look, I'm not here to do you any harm.
context/7: And you'll be dead too if he taught me how to ahoot good.
context/8: At Shiloh.

context: We can hope they head north.
context/0: I'm afraid it's your place, Stella.
context/1: Frank, look.
context/4: Lock him up till the fighting starts.
context/6: Frank stayed with the rest of us.
context/8: Fine thing to have to believe a turncoat.

context: They're coming to claim their dead.
response: Sergeant, when they've gone, send a detail to bury those renegades.
context/0: That's no attack.
context/1: Hold it!
context/4: Those drums are driving me crazy!
context/5: Conover, we need what rest we can get
context/6: # Golden slippers I'm gonna wear because they look for me #
context/8: It won't be any secret.

context/0: Isn't it obvious?
context/1: Where do you think you're going?
context/4: And sell us down the river, is that it?
context/7: Well, they're my shares I can do what I like with them.
context/8: If you hadn't let him buy in, this wouldn't have happened.

context: The father put in the call.
response: He runs the gas station down the highway.
context/0: Those two kids.
context/1: Who discovered the body?
context/4: Not yet.
context/7: Get in touch with the morgue right away.
context/8: They found Davenport's body.
context/9: We've caught up with the runaway corpse, Mr. Mason.

context/0: Oh, aye.
context/1: Tell me, Sergeant, in your professional opinion, do you really believe you can catch this man if he doesn't want you to?
context/3: You seem to have made a great study of crime, Mr. Newspaperman.
context/4: The ones we don't know about yet.
context/6: Now, you say the murderer is always caught because all the ones we know of have been caught.
context/7: Now, there must be many others who have never been discovered.
context/8: Well, those people killed and were discovered only years afterwards by accident or belated confession.
